p: Rosin-norbornene monomers, i.e., dehydroabietanyl norborn-5-ene-2-carboxylate and 4-((norborn-5-ene-2-carbonyl)oxy)butyl dehydroabietate, are viscous oily liquids [ 245]. They can be synthesized from dehydroabietic acid derivatives and norbornenecarboxylic acid according to Scheme 59, prior to evaporation, washing, drying and column chromatography [ 245]. Its application is polymerization, or block copolymerization with norbornene, via “living” ring-opening metathesis polymerization (ROMP) process [ 245, 246].
